name: mobx-react
description: React bindings for MobX. Create fully reactive components.

3.0.0.name: mobx-react
3.0.0.description: React bindings for mobx. Create fully reactive components.

scripts.build: cp index.js native.js && git apply mobx-react-native.patch
scripts.test: browserify test/*.js | tape-run && tsc -p test/ts
scripts.debug: browserify test/*.js | tape-run --browser chrome

4.0.0-rc.1.name: mobx-react

4.0.0-rc.2.name: mobx-react
4.0.0-rc.2.description: React bindings for MobX. Create fully reactive components.

scripts.test: npm run build && npm run test:console
scripts.test:build: browserify -x react/addons -x react/lib/ReactContext -x react/lib/ExecutionEnvironment test/*.js -o ./test/browser/test_bundle.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react ] --plugins [ transform-decorators-legacy transform-class-properties ] ]
scripts.test:travis: webpack && browserify -x react/addons -x react/lib/ReactContext -x react/lib/ExecutionEnvironment test/*.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react ] --plugins [ transform-decorators-legacy transform-class-properties ] ] | tape-run && npm run test:ts
scripts.test:console: browserify -x react/addons -x react/lib/ReactContext -x react/lib/ExecutionEnvironment test/*.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react ] --plugins [ transform-decorators-legacy transform-class-properties ] ] | tape-run | tap-spec && npm run test:ts
scripts.test:browser: npm run test:build && npm run test:open
scripts.build: webpack && cp src/index.d.ts index.d.ts && cp src/index.d.ts native.d.ts && cp src/index.d.ts custom.d.ts

scripts.test:browser: npm run test:build && npm run test:open
scripts.build: webpack && cp src/index.d.ts index.d.ts && cp src/index.d.ts native.d.ts && cp src/index.d.ts custom.d.ts

scripts.test: npm run build && npm run test:console
scripts.test:build: browserify -x react/addons -x react-native -x react/lib/ReactContext -x react/lib/ExecutionEnvironment test/*.js -o ./test/browser/test_bundle.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react ] --plugins [ transform-decorators-legacy transform-class-properties ] ]
scripts.test:travis: webpack && browserify -x react-native -x react/addons -x react/lib/ReactContext -x react/lib/ExecutionEnvironment test/*.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react ] --plugins [ transform-decorators-legacy transform-class-properties ] ] | tape-run && npm run test:ts
scripts.test:console: browserify -x react-native -x react/addons -x react/lib/ReactContext -x react/lib/ExecutionEnvironment test/*.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react ] --plugins [ transform-decorators-legacy transform-class-properties ] ] | tape-run | tap-spec && npm run test:ts
scripts.test:browser: npm run test:build && npm run test:open
scripts.build: webpack && cp src/index.d.ts index.d.ts && cp src/index.d.ts native.d.ts && cp src/index.d.ts custom.d.ts
